name: Amplang Kita
description:
Amplang Kita

Amplang Kita is an interactive and fun idle game that lets you manage your own billion rupiah amplang business!. quick litte fact, amplang is a snack from east kalimantan (borneo)

Game is in Early Access compatible with Android Only!

This game is uploaded for an end project on my college, for survey purposes please click the link below (Survey is in Indonesian language)

https://forms.gle/iiWpjLmdAh3capKF9
